jobs.name: complete-request-watchdog
jobs.description: Checks for stale Mark Complete requests and alerts if verification is overdue
jobs.payload: Run check-complete-requests.ps1, alert Francisco if stale requests found

jobs.name: curiosity-engine
jobs.description: Nightly curiosity scan — discovers anomalies and opportunities, feeds backlog
jobs.payload: Check metrics, competitors, tooling. Generate max 3 proposals with TPS scores.

jobs.name: compound-learn
jobs.description: Nightly Phase 1: LEARN — extract lessons, update instructions, self-test
jobs.payload: Read memory file, review git commits, extract max 5 lessons, update knowledge files.

jobs.name: compound-ship
jobs.description: Nightly Phase 2: SHIP — pick top task from backlog, execute with persona, score output
jobs.payload: Pick highest TPS task, execute, score output, send overnight report.

jobs.name: daily-github-backup
jobs.description: Daily GitHub backup of workspace
jobs.payload: git add workspace/, git commit, git push origin main.

jobs.name: biweekly-council-improvement
jobs.description: Every 2 weeks: adaptive multi-round Council session (up to 6 rounds)
jobs.payload: Run full Council debate protocol, implement consensus changes, git commit.

jobs.name: memory-consolidation
jobs.description: Nightly memory consolidation — extract events, update knowledge base, rebuild recall pack
jobs.payload: Follow memory-consolidation.md procedure exactly. Git commit all changes.

jobs.name: cofounder-sprint
jobs.description: Proactive co-founder sprint - spot opportunities, build tools, fix inefficiencies, ship value
jobs.payload: Opportunity scan, build something, fix inefficiencies, prep tomorrow, send morning brief.

jobs.name: weekly-index-rebuild
jobs.description: Weekly full rebuild of memory indexes from scratch to prevent silent drift
jobs.payload: Rebuild open-loops.json from ledger.jsonl, run Memory CI test harness.

jobs.name: ghost-broker-moltbook-daily
jobs.description: Daily Ghost Broker marketing on Moltbook - post content, engage with community
jobs.payload: Check replies, post daily content, comment on hot posts, track metrics.

jobs.name: buckydrop-monitor
jobs.description: BuckyDrop support check (8 AM/PM) - check for replies to feedback tickets
jobs.payload: Check Outlook inbox, check BuckyDrop Feedback page, notify Francisco if response.

jobs.name: ghost-broker-daily-blog
jobs.description: Daily expert blog post for Ghost Broker AI - SEO traffic and thought leadership
jobs.payload: Research topic, write 1500-2000 word post, create HTML, update blog.html.

jobs.name: daily-ai-research-brief
jobs.description: Daily AI research brief - scan X, search news, check ClawdHub
jobs.payload: Read X feed, search Clawdbot/Claude news, identify top 3 improvements.

jobs.name: ghost-broker-twitter-daily
jobs.description: Daily Ghost Broker marketing on X/Twitter - tweet, engage, grow
jobs.payload: Check mentions, post 1 tweet, quote-tweet 1 news, reply to 3-5 influencers.

jobs.name: ghost-broker-influencer-outreach
jobs.description: Daily influencer engagement - comments, shares, relationship building
jobs.payload: Find 3 posts, engage with value, connect if warm, track in pipeline.

jobs.name: ghost-broker-credibility-monitor
jobs.description: Daily credibility monitoring - trust signals, opportunities, social metrics
jobs.payload: Check social metrics, search mentions, check competitors, submit to directories.

jobs.name: ghost-broker-moltbook-x-engagement
jobs.description: Daily engagement with @moltbook X account - reply to tweets, build community
jobs.payload: Find and reply to @moltbook tweets with value-add comments.

jobs.name: ghost-broker-openclaw-x-engagement
jobs.description: Daily engagement with @openclaw X account - reply to tweets, build community
jobs.payload: Find and reply to @openclaw tweets with value-add comments.

jobs.name: ghost-broker-website-audit
jobs.description: Daily self-improvement audit - find blindspots and opportunities on ghostbrokerai.xyz
jobs.payload: Read all pages, competitor analysis, UX review, content gaps, SEO check.

jobs.name: Weekly Self-Improvement
jobs.description: Automated weekly check for updates, new skills, and continuous improvement
jobs.payload: Check Clawdbot version, clawdhub update, review learnings, check docs.

jobs.name: ghost-broker-linkedin-weekly
jobs.description: 3x/week Ghost Broker marketing on LinkedIn - professional updates
jobs.payload: Post 1 update, connect with 5 profiles, comment on 2 posts.

jobs.name: weekly-council-aplus-validation
jobs.description: Weekly Council A+ validation with skip-if-unchanged and max 3 loops
jobs.payload: Run check-infra-changed.ps1, if changed run Council validation on 10 components.

jobs.name: DLM Urgent Morning Alert
jobs.description: One-time Shopify Protect alert (already fired)
jobs.payload: Alert about expiring Shopify Protect.

jobs.name: dns-check-ghostbroker
jobs.description: One-time check: has ghostbrokerai.xyz DNS propagated to Cloudflare?
jobs.payload: Check Cloudflare dashboard, add custom domain if active.
